github_repo: {{ cookiecutter.sourcecode_url | replace('https://github.com/', '') if 'https://github.com/' in cookiecutter.sourcecode_url else '' }}

__prompts__.project_url: Primary website for the project, leave blank for Sunpy Homepage
__prompts__.sourcecode_url: Version control link for the project
__prompts__.github_repo: user/repo format GitHub repository. Leave blank if project is not on GitHub.
__prompts__.download_url: PyPi address for the project, optional
__prompts__.issue_tracker_url: URL to the issue tracker, optional
